metadata.description: Claude Skills for systematic Lean 4 proof development and persistent learning

plugins.name: lean4-theorem-proving
plugins.description: Systematic approach to developing formal proofs in Lean 4, managing sorries, using mathlib, and building verified mathematics

plugins.name: lean4-memories
plugins.description: Persistent memory integration for Lean 4 formalization - remembers successful proof patterns, avoids known dead-ends, and adapts to project-specific conventions across sessions
